title: GLR - EDA(all you need to know)
description: 1. IntroductionGoogle Landmark Recognition is an image classification challenges like the ImageNet Large Scale Visual Recognition Challenge (ILSVRC), which aims to recognize 1K general object categories. Landmark recognition is a little different from that: it contains a much larger number of classes (there are more than 81K classes in this challenge), and the number of training examples per class may not be very large. Landmark recognition is challenging in its own way.
